thread.title: Former American Heritage QB Torrance Gibson suspended after academic issues at Ohio State
thread.title_full: Former American Heritage QB Torrance Gibson suspended after academic issues at Ohio State - Sun Sentinel

author: Patrick Maks
title: Former American Heritage QB Torrance Gibson suspended after academic issues at Ohio State
text:
Torrance Gibson has run into trouble at Ohio State.
Gibson, the former American Heritage star quarterback, missed the Buckeyes’ 38-10 home win over Penn State on Saturday because of poor grades, coach Urban Meyer told reporters during his weekly press conference.
“You have to earn the right to dress,” Meyer said Monday, “and he didn't do it last week."
Meyer confirmed Gibson remains a member of the team and said he expects him to return to the Buckeyes sidelines soon.
Gibson, who committed to OSU after a lengthy and public recruitment, switched positions to receiver during the preseason in an attempt to earn more playing time as a freshman. He has yet to play this season.
Gibson was the 2014 All-Broward County Player of the Year.
 The Pennsylvania State University Urban Meyer
